entry.title: Raw Moringa Leaf Powder Capsules (Pure, Vegan & Organic) | Moringa Life
entry.summary:
Vendor: Moringa Life
Type: Supplements
Price: 126.50

Moringa Life's Raw Moringa Leaf Powder Capsules (120 vegan caps) is a potent, concentrated all-round healer for optimal health, and prevention and treatment of illness.

  • Moringa Oleifera is widely used as a super food for its high nutritional value, with a higher concentration of vitamins and minerals than most other plants
  • Contains 92 nutrients, 46 antioxidants, 36 anti-inflammatories, 18 amino acids, 9 essential amino acids
  • Contains 2 x more protein than yoghurt, 3 x more potassium than bananas, 4 x more calcium than milk, 4 x more Vitamin A than carrots, 7 x more Vitamin C than oranges
  • Used for "tired blood" (anemia), arthritis and other joint pain, asthma, cancer, constipation, diabetes, diarrhea, epilepsy, stomach pain, ulcers, intestinal spasms, headaches, heart problems, high blood pressure, kidney stones, fluid retention, thyroid problems, bacterial infections, fungal infections, viral infections, parasitic infections and muscle recovery
  • Moringa is also used to reduce swelling, boost the immune system, increase breastmilk production, reduce inflammation, and increase mental alertness
  • No negative side effects associated with Moringa Oleifera use
  • 100% vegan, soy-free, 100% organic, non-GMO, 100% natural (no additives), gluten-free and dairy-free!

Ingredients

Moringa Leaf Powder in vegan capsule

entry.title: Colic Calmer - Natural homeopathic remedy for babies treats infant colic
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Homeopathic Remedy Granules
Price: 117.00

Colic Calmer is a natural homeopathic remedy that gently and safely calms the colic chaos and helps babies to sleep
  • Safely soothes infant colic & infant reflux
  • Soothes and calms your baby and promotes peaceful sleep
  • Promotes digestive comfort & health & soothes infant reflux
  • Alcohol-free with no preservatives
  • Easy to use - simply sprinkle on the tongue!
  • Natural homeopathic formula

Ingredients

Chamomilla (6C) is a well-known homeopathic remedy for infant colic, digestive comfort and teething.
Mag Phos (6C) is an effective and gentle homeopathic painkiller and is often recommended to safely treat cramping pain. It is suitable for all age groups including small babies

Lactose (inactive ingredient)

Directions:

Colic Calmer is presented in fine granules called 'sprinkles', that dissolve easily on the tongue making it easy to administer to babies.

Sprinkle a small pinch of Colic Calmer on your baby’s tongue at the very first signs of colic for quick relief. Dosage may be repeated every 20 minutes for up to 10 doses if necessary.

Note: If symptoms persist or worsen, a health care professional should be consulted. Keep this and all medicines from the reach of children.

Note:
Consult your doctor if symptoms persist or worsen.

    Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: Worm Dr - Eradicate worms with natural herbal worm medicine
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Herbal Tincture
Price: 121.50

Worm Dr is a 100% natural, herbal & homeopathic vermifuge (a natural remedy that helps to expel worms). Worm Dr will help to eradicate all types of intestinal worms in children and in adults and will also promote a healthy digestive tract. (50 ml)
  • Assists the body to naturally eradicate intestinal worms & systemic parasites
  • Boosts the body’s immune system
  • Promotes balance in the digestive system
  • Safe for adults and children

Ingredients

Worm Dr contains the following natural ingredients in our unique concentrated 100% herbal and homeopathic formula, manufactured according to Whole Herb Technology: 

Glycorrhiza Glabra (licorice root), Agrimonia Eupatoria (Agrimony), Althea Officinalis (Marshmallow), Artemesia africana (Wormwood or Wilde-Als), Chamomilla (30C), Cina (30C), Ethanol (inactive ingredient)

Directions

Worm Dr comes in convenient concentrated tincture (drop) form and is diluted in water or juice. 

Directions:
Children 15 years and under: Use one drop per age year of the child.
Adults and children over 16 years: 15 - 20 drops.

Dilute in approx. 1/4 glass of water or juice before breakfast for four days. Repeat after two weeks.

Caution:
Not recommended for children under one year old or during pregnancy unless under medical supervision. Please consult a doctor should symptoms persist.

    Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.
entry.s:tag: How to get rid of worms naturally

Type: Homeopathic Remedy Tincture
Price: 121.50

Du Du Drops is a safe and effective homeopathic remedy specially formulated by a Clinical Psychologist to calm and relax toddlers and young children and induce a state of drowsiness. Use from 1 year up. (Note Babies 0 - 12 months use Sleepy Sprinkles)

  • Top Selling all-natural sleep remedy for babies & children
  • Formulated by a Clinical Psychologist to help children sleep
  • Prevents night time behavioural problems & restores healthy, regular sleep patterns
  • Relaxes & calms your child & promotes natural, peaceful sleep
  • Also assists with sleep problems caused by teething

Ingredients

Chamomilla (6C), Cina (30C), Coffea (30C), Pulsatilla (6C)

Directions

Dilute 5 drops in a teaspoon of milk or water just before bedtime or add to the bedtime bottle. May be repeated after 15 minutes if necessary or during the night up to 5 doses.

For babies younger than 12 months: Use Sleepy Sprinkles

Children over 12 years: Use Feelgood Health's Serenite Plus Drops for teenagers and adults.

entry.title: Fertile XY - Herbal fertility remedy for men improves sperm count
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Herbal Tincture
Price: 121.50

Fertile XY is formulated especially for men as a herbal fertility tonic. When a couple are trying to fall pregnant, Fertile XY for Men can assist by supporting male reproductive health, healthy sperm and testosterone production and a strong sex drive.  (50 ml)

  • Improves the functioning of male sexual organs (prostate, seminal vesicles, testes, penis)
  • Increases sperm production, improves sperm motility and health
  • Boosts testosterone levels
  • Counteracts the effects of free radicals on sperm health
  • Increases sex drive, strengthens erections and encourages greater sexual pleasure

Ingredients

Fertile XY is formulated according to the principles of Whole Herb Technology, staying true to the Full Spectrum manufacturing principles of herbal medicine. The 100% natural herbal ingredients of Fertile XY are: 

Epimedium grandiflorum (also known as Yin Yang Huo or Horny Goat Weed), Centella Asiatica (also known as Gotu Cola), Tribulus terristis (also known as Gokshura), Ethanol (inactive ingredient)

    Directions

    Fertile XY comes in convenient concentrated drop form which is easy to take. 

    Dosage: Take 15 - 20 drops in appr. 1/4 glass water or juice three times daily. For maximum effect, use as part of a healthy lifestyle, diet and exercise program. 

    Feelgood Health Tip!

    Use Fertile XX (for women) together with Fertile XY (for men) to optimise male and female reproductive health and increase the chances of healthy conception

          Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: Sceletium Capsules: Traditional Natural Mood Tonic | Big Tree
entry.summary:
Vendor: Absolute Organics
Type: Supplements
Price: 121.00

Big Tree's Sceletium Capsules (60 vegetarian capsules) are a traditional African mood tonic.

  • Sceletium has a long history of use in African Traditional Medicine
  • Elevates mood, acts as a natural anti-depressant and decreases anxiety, stress and tension
  • Also useful as a drug & alcohol withdrawal aid. Sceletium is known to reduce addictive cravings particularly with regard to nicotine and also lessens the withdrawal effects of alcohol and other addictive drugs
  • Enhances the immune response and acts as an adaptogen (similar in action to the Chinese herb Astragalus membranaceous)
  • Vegan & vegetarian friendly (veggie capsule)
  • Free of corn, yeast, wheat, soy, salt, sugar and dairy products and formulated without preservatives, artificial colours or flavours.

Ingredients

BigTree Sceletium Capsules contain only: ﻿100% pure Sceletium tortuosum 100mg

Inactive Ingredients: Microcrystalline cellulose, Silicone dioxide, Magnesium Stearate

Directions for use

Dosage: take 1 capsule twice daily or as directed by a healthcare practitioner.

Contraindications and Side Effects

Although there have been no confirmed reports of drug interactions, the neuro-receptor activities of Sceletium suggest that there may be interactions with other psychiatric medications and cardiac drugs. People taking any psychiatric drugs (including all anti-anxiety drugs, sedatives, hypnotics, anti-psychotics and antidepressants, including MAO inhibitors, and particularly SSRI's) are advised to not take Sceletium-containing products.

Please consult your health care professional before replacing any pharmaceutical antidepressant with Sceletium. When used at the recommended dose there are no documented side-effects. In large doses Sceletium can cause euphoria, but this is easily managed by reducing the dose. Do not use during pregnancy or while breastfeeding.

    Note: Consult your doctor if symptoms persist or worsen.

      Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: Natural Moves: Natural laxative remedy for chronic or occasional constipation
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Natural Remedy Capsule
Price: 145.00

Feelgood Health Natural Moves (60 capsules) can be used for both chronic and occasional constipation, depending on the dosage used. The herbs used in Natural Moves Tablets promote healthy digestion and also act as an effective liver tonic, therefore avoiding the risk of dependency and side effects associated with some other laxative products.

  • Acts as a natural laxative to relieve constipation without harming your body
  • Relaxes the muscles of the bowel wall, eases anxiety and tension and promotes normal bowel movements
  • Enhances healthy liver & gall bladder functioning
  • Promotes the flow of bile and improves digestion
  • Relieves constipation associated with IBS and other digestive complaints
  • Reduces dependency on harmful OTC laxatives and promotes normal, regular bowel movements

Ingredients

Natural Moves contains the following therapeutic herbs in a 100% vegan friendly vege-capsule.

Aloe Ferox, Taraxacum officinale (Dandelion), Passiflora incarnata

    Like all Feelgood Health products, Natural Moves contains no animal products, gluten, artificial flavours, colours or preservatives and is not tested on animals.

      Directions for use

      Natural Moves contains fresh powdered whole spectrum herbs in therapeutic dosage. Dosage depends on individual needs as well as whether your constipation is chronic or only an occasional problem.

      For Occasional Constipation: Two capsules when needed taken with a glass of water or milk at night will easily help to produce a normal bowel movement upon awakening. Make sure that you allow yourself time the next morning to enjoy a natural bowel movement before beginning your day!

      For Chronic and Stubborn Constipation: Take 1/2 to one capsule every morning and two capsules at night.

      Children over the age of 6 may occasionally use 1/2 - 1 capsule of Natural Moves at night. Capsules may be opened and mixed with a little food for those who prefer not to swallow them whole.

      Caution: Safety during pregnancy and breastfeeding has not been established. Do not exceed the recommended dose! Please consult your doctor if there are sudden changes to your normal bowel habits, if you experience pain, fever or blood in your stools or if symptoms persist for more than two weeks, despite treatment.

      NOTE: As an aid in the treatment of IBS, use together with Gastronic Dr. 

      Note:
      Consult your doctor if symptoms persist or worsen.

        Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Herbal Tincture
Price: 121.50

Immunity Plus contains a selection of herbal ingredients known to have a positive effect on the immune system, as well as on the liver. It is therefore an excellent immune system tonic and may be used as a natural antibiotic alternative. 
  • Contains herbal antiviral ingredients
  • Acts as a natural antibiotic alternative
  • Strengthens the immune system to guard against infection
  • Assists recovery and convalescence after illness
  • Assists in the treatment of immune compromised illnesses

Ingredients

Immunity Plus contains the following ingredients in our unique concentrated 100% herbal formula, manufactured according to Whole Herb Technology: ﻿

Echinacea purpurea, Hypoxis Rooperi (extract of African Potato), Agothosma betulina (buchu),  Mentha piperita, Solidago virgaurea, Viscum album, Crataegus oxycanthoides, Schizandra sinesis,  Astralagus membranaceus, Olea europea (extract of olive leaf), Propolis, Ethanol (inactive ingredient)

Directions

Teens & adults: Take 10 to 15 drops in a little water three times daily. 

Children: Use KiddieBoost for children under 12 years. 

Caution: Immunity Plus should not be used if there is any known allergy to bees or to substances containing honey or bee products. Safety during pregnancy or breastfeeding has not yet been established. Immunity Plus is not a substitute for medical treatment of serious chronic illness. Please consult your doctor if symptoms persist.

entry.title: Iqawe for Men - Herbal remedy increases male libido & sexual health
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Herbal Tincture
Price: 121.50

Iqawe for Men is a unique combination of herbs formulated to address the causes of low libido and male sexual dysfunction. Its powerful aphrodisiac properties also help to boost sexual desire and enhance performance, leading to a healthier sex life. Iqawe means "Warrior" or "Strong" in Xhosa
  • Boosts sexual arousal, performance and stamina
  • Prevents erectile problems and supports strong healthy erections
  • Increases erect penis size & prevents premature ejaculation
  • Raises sexual energy levels
  • Alleviates anxiety caused by problems in sexual performance
  • Achieves stronger and more pleasurable ejaculation

Ingredients

Iqawe for Men contains the following ingredients in our unique concentrated 100% herbal formula, manufactured according to Whole Herb Technology: 

Tribulus terristis, Epimedium grandiflorum, (Horny Goatweed), Sabal serrulata (Saw palmetto), Eleutherococcus senticosis (Siberian Ginseng), Smilax ornata (Sarsaparilla),  Glycorrhiza glabra, Kola vera, Ethanol (natural preservative and extracting agent)

Directions

As a herbal tonic for male sexual health, Iqawe should be used regularly for best effect.

Dosage: Take 10 to 15 drops in a little water three times daily. An additional dose can be taken 15 minutes before sex.

NOTE:  Iqawe is best used in combination with a healthy diet and regular exercise. Avoid excessive smoking and alcohol (especially beer) and do not wear tight trousers or underwear.

  • Keeps little chests & noses clear & encourages easy breathing
  • Promotes sound and healthy sleep
  • Helps to avoid the antibiotic cycle
  • Easy to use - simply sprinkle on the tongue!
  • Safe for all ages, including newborns
  • Locally manufactured to reduce YOUR carbon footprint!

Ingredients

Sniffly Sprinkles contains the following 100% active homeopathic ingredients in baby-safe therapeutic dosage:

Nat Mur (6C), Nux vom (6C), Alium cepa (6C), Ferrum phos (D6), Windflower (6C), Influenzinum (30C), Baccillum (30C), Sucrose (inactive ingredient)

Sniffly Sprinkles contains no gluten, artificial flavours, colours or preservatives. 

Our products are animal-cruelty free. Individual ingredients are well-researched and are natural, safe and effective.

Directions for use

Directions:

Sniffly Sprinkles are presented in fine granules (we call them 'sprinkles') that dissolve easily on the tongue making this remedy easy to administer to babies.

Sprinkle a pinch onto the tongue every hour until symptoms subside. Thereafter use three times daily for 2 - 3 days.

Caution: Always consult a doctor or health professional if you are concerned or need advice about your baby’s health. Keep this and all medicines out of reach of children.

Cantharis (30C), Causticum (6C), Equisetum (6C), Ferrum phos (D6), Sucrose (inactive ingredient).

    Directions for use

    Directions: Sprinkle granules directly into the mouth and hold closed briefly, or add to wet food.

    Initial dose: Every 30 minutes for up to ten doses. Thereafter, three times daily. When symptoms have subsided, you can reduce to once a day. Should symptoms re-appear, simply increase to three times a day again. 

    Cats and small dogs: One large pinch of granules.
    Small to medium dogs: 2 pinches.
    Medium to large dogs: 1/4 cap granules.

    NOTE: Consult your vet if symptoms persist or worsen.

    Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness. Please consult your veterinarian if symptoms persist.

entry.title: Fertile XX - Herbal Fertility Remedy for women - to promote conception
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Herbal Tincture
Price: 121.50

Fertile XX is formulated especially for women who are trying to fall pregnant. As a herbal fertility tonic, Fertile XX contains herbs that are well-known for their ability to promote health and balance in the female reproductive system. (50 ml)

  • Promotes healthy and regular ovulation
  • Corrects hormone imbalances underlying infertility
  • Strengthens and tones fallopian tubes & promotes ovarian health
  • Supports healthy uterine functioning & regulates menstrual cycle
  • Boosts libido and sexual pleasure

Ingredients

Fertile XX is formulated according to the principles of Whole Herb Technology, staying true to the Full Spectrum manufacturing principles of herbal medicine. The 100% natural herbal ingredients of Fertile XX are: 

Vitex agnus-castus (Chasteberry), Cimicifuga racemosa (Black Cohosh), 
Eleutherococcus senticosis (Siberian Ginseng), Ethanol (inactive ingredient)

Directions

Fertile XX comes in convenient concentrated drop form which is easy to take. 

Dosage: Take 15 - 20 drops in appr. 1/4 glass water or juice three times daily. For maximum effect, use as part of a healthy lifestyle, diet and exercise program. 

Caution:  Although all the ingredients in Fertile XX are well tolerated and safe, safety in pregnancy has not yet been established. As a precaution it is therefore best for women to stop taking them as soon as conception has taken place.

Feelgood Health Tip!

  • Use Fertile XX (for women) together with Fertile XY (for men) to optimise male and female reproductive health and increase the chances of healthy conception..  
  • Where fertility problems are affected by hormonal conditions such as PCOS (Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome) or Endometriosis, use Fertile XX together with Don Quai for best chances of success. 

      Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: Earth Products Non-Irradiated Turmeric Powder (250 g)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Earth Products
Type: Superfoods
Price: 29.00

Turmeric powder is a common culinary spice in Indian cuisine and is also used  in Ayurvedic medicine, fast making its way to the natural health treasure chest! Turmeric has powerful anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties! Most turmeric found in stores has been irradiated which removes the beneficial therapeutic properties, so make sure that you only use non-irradiated turmeric powder!

Health benefits of turmeric

  • Acts as a digestive aid - helps to stimulate the gall bladder to produce more bile, which is important to break down dietary fat
  • Studies have shown that Curcumin can reduce the growth of cancerous cells and new blood vessels in tumours
  • The powerful anti-inflammatory and oxidative properties of curcumin make it a perfect choice to reduce arthritis symptoms
  • Helps to prevent Alzheimer's and promotes brain and neurotransmitter balance
  • For bronchial asthma stir a teaspoon of the powder in a glass of milk or preferred drink and drink up to 3 times a day
  • Can also be used in DIY skin care products to naturally cleanse, purify and brighten the skin! 
  • Non-irradiated turmeric is a key ingredient in Golden Milk (haldi doodh) - an Ayurvedic health drink

How to use Turmeric Powder

Turmeric powder can be added to food dishes, sauces, soups and drinks like tea and milk! It is best to have on an empty stomach. 

Turmeric Tea - Dissolve 5 grams (about 1 teaspoon) of turmeric powder into boiled water or almond milk. You can also add lemon, honey, ginger and other spices to enhance the flavour of this delicious drink.

Ingredients:

100% Non-irradiated Turmeric Powder

    Disclaimer: This product has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: UTI-Clear - Natural herbal remedy for Urinary Tract Infections (UTI)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Herbal Tincture
Price: 121.50

UTI-Clear is a natural herbal remedy to relieve the acute symptoms of a urinary tract or bladder infection, while restoring health & balance to the urinary tract and supporting a strong immune system.(50 ml)

  • Stops burning when urinating, helps to flush out the bladder and urinate more easily
  • Reduces the need for frequent urination and eliminates inability to urinate even though you have the urge
  • Treats and prevents recurring cystitis and bladder infection
  • Assists with bloating and as a diuretic
  • Reduces your dependence on antibiotics for UTI infection

Ingredients

UTI-Clear contains the following ingredients in our unique concentrated 100% herbal formula, manufactured according to Whole Herb Technology: 

Agothosma betulina (buchu), Arctostaphylos uva-ursi, Achillea millifolium, Melissa officinalis (lemon balm),  Avena sativa, Hypericum perforatum, Echinacea angustifolia, Vaccinium myrtillus (billberry), Ethanol (inactive ingredient)

Directions

UTI-Clear comes in convenient concentrated tincture (drop) form and is diluted in water or juice. Use UTI-Clear at the very first signs of a urinary tract infection and continue for 7 days. In the case of chronic recurring urinary tract infections, it is highly recommended that Feelgood Health Immunity Plus be used together with UTI-Clear in order to strengthen the immune system. 

Dosage:

Adults and Teenagers over 12: 15 drops in water or juice two to three times a day.

Children: One drop per age year of the child two to three times daily

Caution: Safety during pregnancy and breastfeeding has not been clinically established. Please consult your doctor should symptoms persist.

    Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.
entry.s:tag: Natural Remedy for urinary tract infection

Vendor: Big Tree
Type: Supplements
Price: 92.00

Big Tree's Warburgia (60 veggie tablets) serve as a natural African antibiotic alternative, and traditionally used for bladder and UTI infections.

  • Warburgia has a long history of use in African Traditional Medicine
  • An effective treatment for cystitis and bladder infections and an excellent natural antibiotic in general
  • Also used as a natural treatment for headaches & respiratory infections such as coughs, chest congestion (being an excellent expectorant) and bronchial infections, as well as sinusitis
  • Vegan & vegetarian friendly (veggie tablets)
  • Free of corn, yeast, wheat, soy, salt, sugar and dairy products and formulated without preservatives, artificial colours or flavours
  • Made in South Africa to reduce YOUR carbon footprint!

Ingredients

Big Tree Warburgia Tablets contain: ﻿100% pure Warburgia salutarus 100mg

Inactive Ingredients:  Microcrystalline cellulose, Potato starch, Silicone dioxide, Magnesium Stearate

Directions for use

Dosage: Take 1 tablet twice daily or as directed by a healthcare practitioner.

Note: Consult your doctor if symptoms persist or worsen.

entry.title: Sutherlandia Capsules: Traditional 'Cancerbush' | Big Tree
entry.summary:
Vendor: Big Tree
Type: Supplements
Price: 103.50

Big Tree's Sutherlandia Capsules (60 vegetable capsules) has a long history of use in African Traditional Medicine and is one of the most profound and multi-purpose plants in Southern Africa.

  • Enhances the immune response and acts as an adaptogen (similar in action to the Chinese herb Astragalus membranaceous)
  • Traditionally used for a variety of conditions, enhancing well-being, immune support, longevity, stress, depression and anxiety, wasting from cancer, TB, and AIDS, influenza, chronic fatigue syndrome, viral hepatitis, asthma and bronchitis, type 2 diabetes, mild to moderate hypertension, rheumatoid arthritis, peptic ulcer, gastritis, reflux oesophagitis, hot flushes and irritability in menopause, and herpes. Studies also indicate significant antioxidant activity
  • Sutherlandia functions as an appetite stimulant in wasted patients, but not in healthy people
  • Vegan & vegetarian friendly 
  • Free of corn, yeast, wheat, soy, salt, sugar and dairy products and formulated without preservatives, artificial colours or flavours.

  • Organically grown without the use of synthetic pesticides, herbicides or chemical fertilizers. Pesticide residue free

Ingredients

BigTree Sutherlandia Capsules contain only: ﻿100% pure Sutherlandia frutescens subsp. microphylla 350mg

Inactive Ingredients: Vegetable cellulose capsule, Silicon dioxide, Potato starch, Magnesium Stearate

Directions for use

Dosage: take 1 capsule twice daily or as directed by a healthcare practitioner.

Contraindications and Side Effects

When used at the recommended dose there are no documented side-effects.

Do not use during pregnancy or while breastfeeding. Dosage of anti-hypertensive and anti-diabetic medication may need to be reduced and preliminary studies suggest possible interactions with anti-retroviral drugs. Sutherlandia should not be taken while on anti-coagulants such as Heparin and Warfarin, and it is recommended that the use of the product be stopped two weeks prior to elective surgery.

Certain plants such as Sutherlandia, Astragalus and Alfalfa contain the non-protein amino acid L-canavanine. Those afflicted with Systemic Lupus Erthematosus should consult their health care professional before taking plants containing L-canavanine, as reports suggest that significant ingestion of this amino acid may cause recurrence of this disease in patients where the disease has become dormant. 

    Note: Consult your doctor if symptoms persist or worsen.

      Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: Uro-Tonic - Homeopathic remedy for bladder health & incontinence
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Homeopathic Remedy Tincture
Price: 121.50

Uro-Tonic (360 tablets) is a 100% safe and homeopathic remedy that treats various types of incontinence in adults and strengthens the bladder.

  • The ingredients in this remedy are traditionally used as a bladder tonic and to treat stress incontinence, urge incontinence and an over-sensitive bladder
  • Treats stress incontinence which happens due to physical movement such as sneezing, coughing, lifting, etc.
  • Treats urge incontinence, a sudden, intense urge to urinate followed by an involuntary loss of urine
  • 100% safe and natural homeopathic formula
  • Supports the health and integrity of the urinary system

  • For teenagers and adults (see DryNight for young children and toddlers)

Ingredients

Cantharis (30C), Causticum (6C), Equisetum (6C), Sepia (30C), Nat mur (6C), Ferrum phos (6C), Lactose (inactive ingredient)

How to use

Initially suck 2 tablets, every 2 hours for 5 doses. Thereafter, suck 2 tablets, 2-3 times per day.

entry.title: SOS-HistaDrops: Natural remedy for hay fever & seasonal allergies
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Herbal Tincture
Price: 121.50

SOS HistaDrops is a natural on the spot remedy for seasonal allergies and hay fever. It combines herbal and homeopathic ingredients known for their ability to maintain balance in the immune system and to support histamine levels within the normal range – for clear eyes, noses and easy breathing. (50 ml)
  • Treats the symptoms of airborne allergies, Allergic Rhinitis and hayfever
  • Clears a runny nose and watering eyes
  • Reduces wheezing, sneezing and itchy eyes and nose
  • Relieves inflammation, redness and swollen eyes
  • Reduces dependence on OTC and prescription antihistamines 
  • No unwanted side effects or drowsiness
  • Safe for children & adults

Ingredients

SOS HistaDrops contain the following ingredients in our unique concentrated 100% herbal and homeopathic formula, manufactured according to Whole Herb Technology: ﻿

Urtica urens, Plantago lanceolata, Allium cepa (30C),  Ars. iod. (30C), Ethanol (inactive ingredient)

Directions

Dilute the drops in at least 1/4 cup (less for the younger child) of water or juice. 

Adults and teenagers: 10 - 15 drops every 4 hours or as needed
Children 4 - 12: 5 - 10 drops

Note: SOS HistaDrops offers fast symptomatic relief from symptoms of hayfever, allergies and allergic rhinitis whenever you need it.

For people with severe and recurring hay fever, preventative action is best. In order to balance, strengthen and support the system and protect against allergies, we recommend regular use of Feelgood Health AllergiClear as a preventative treatment for all allergic conditions. 

Caution: Safety during pregnancy or breastfeeding has not yet been established. 

    Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: Prostate Dr - Herbal remedy for BPH to promote natural prostate health
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Herbal Tincture
Price: 121.50

Prostate Dr. is a unique and proprietary blend of three highly effective herbal remedies combined in therapeutic dosage, and will address all the major symptoms of BPH, helping to reduce prostate swelling and bring fast relief from symptoms of prostate swelling.(50 ml)

  • Effective natural tonic for the prostate gland in men over 40
  • Helps to prevent the occurrence of BPH (benign prostate swelling) 
  • Reduces an enlarged prostate 
  • Promotes strong and healthy urine flow
  • Addresses weak and dribbling urine stream
  • Relieves prostatitis (inflammation or infection of the prostate)
  • Strengthens the immune system

Ingredients

Prostate Dr is formulated according to the principles of Whole Herb Technology, staying true to the Full Spectrum manufacturing principles of herbal medicine. The 100% natural herbal ingredients of Prostate Dr are: 

    Epilobium parviflorum, Sabal serrulata (Saw Palmetto), Hypoxis rooperi (extract of African Potato), Ethanol (inactive ingredient)

    Directions

    Prostate Dr comes in convenient concentrated drop form which is easy to take. 

    Dosage: For acute BPH and prostatitis, take 15 - 20 drops in a little water three times per day. As a preventative and prostate tonic it is recommended that all men over 40 should take 10 - 15 drops in a little water or juice two to three times daily. 

    Caution: Do not combine with finasteride or other medications used to treat BPH.
